thread.title: S.F. real estate investor gets 7-year sentence in art fraud case
thread.title_full: S.F. real estate investor gets 7-year sentence in art fraud case - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bob Egelko
title: S.F. real estate investor gets 7-year sentence in art fraud case
text:
Photo: U.S. Marshals Service Luke Brugnara Luke Brugnara
A real estate investor who escaped from the San Francisco federal courthouse for six days, then was tried and convicted of an $11 million art fraud, has been sentenced to seven years in federal prison. Luke Brugnara Luke Brugnara
A real estate investor who escaped from the San Francisco federal courthouse for six days, then was tried and convicted of an $11 million art fraud, has been sentenced to seven years in federal prison.
